name: INSnoozeTasksIntent
desc: A request to snooze one or more tasks.

items.name: init(tasks: [INTask]?, nextTriggerTime: INDateComponentsRange?, all: Bool?)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with information about the tasks to snooze and when to snooze them.

items.name: var nextTriggerTime: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The next time after the current time that triggers a task to snooze.

items.name: var tasks: [INTask]?
items.desc: An array of tasks to snooze.

items.name: var all: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to snooze all of the tasks.
